Class CompanyRepController

java.lang.Object
controller.CompanyRepController
public class CompanyRepController extends Object
Controller for managing Company Representative operations. Handles registration, approval, rejection, loading/saving reps, and filtering internships for company representatives.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    CompanyRepController(FilterManager filterManager)
    Constructor to initialize the controller with a filter manager.
